title: Riot Plz
body: Ok so, i just finished my provisionals... i won 2 out of the 10... went negative in 9 of them... and got put into Silver 5... how?! Riot Plz

replies.body:
Then there are others with like 8 wins under their provisional belt and they got put into Bronze II or III.

The rank system, hmmmmm, a little silly.

Maybe it's the preseason, he is the mastermind behind all this non-sense.

GEEETTTTT HIMMMMMMMMMMMMMM
Yeah I know right haha, but still... I'm happy xD
If you were ranked last season, u would have been reset to an mmr.  But wtf.. i still dont understand how u could even stay./ get silver 5 with 2 wins.
Ive never been ranked in my life haha

im not lying hahaha i swear to god, i just decided to do my provisionals because i was like "eh why not just get like bronze 4"
and i got silver 5

Because normals MMR or something.
Which is why I got put as Silver Four with 80 wins.
Wait a minute.
